Row.Text: The Eagle is an Aztec unique unit. Although costlier than the Spearman it replaces, the Eagle can see farther and grants a combat bonus to all nearby land units. This promotion is lost upon upgrade.
Ancient-era defensive unit that can see farther and grants a combat bonus to all nearby land units. Only the Aztecs may built it.

The Eagle warriors were the scouts of the Aztec Warriors as well as being good fighters. They were the eyes, ears, the messengers who would find the information necessary to lead and strategize an attack. These warriors often wore helmets adorned with eagle feathers and heads. They adorned their armour with feathers and carried brightly coloured shields.
+1 Sight. Nearby units gain 15% Combat Strength.
